titles.title: Ambassadors Qualification Act of 2008
To amend the Foreign Service Act of 1980 to prescribe certain qualifications to be eligible to serve as an ambassador.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
7/31/2008--Introduced.
Ambassadors Qualification Act of 2008 - Amends the Foreign Service Act of 1980 to specify certain qualifications to be eligible to serve as an ambassador or an ambassador at large.
